Detailed Description

BtAvrcpPanelApplication is application of bluetooth avrcp panel. Bt Avrcp Panel Application is the only interface between BT APOXI AVRCP and Audio/Video applications(such as Media player). This application is responsible for registering and unregistering to BT APOXI AVRCP. The operation requests from BT APOXI AVRCP are directed to active a/v plugin and the response is sent back to BT APOXI AVRCP.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum BtAvrcpPanelApplication::BtAvrcpPanelAppFeatures
 

BtAvrcpPanel of Feature indizes.

Enumerator:
BtAvrcpPanelSetActiveSubUnit  To display list of subunits in order to set one among them as active.
BtAvrcpOpenControllerWindow  To open controller window.
BtAvrcpControllerSelectDeviceRequest  Select a bluetooth device.
BtAvrcpControllerConnectRequest  Connect request from the controller to a target.
BtAvrcpControllerDisconnectRequest  Disconnect request from the controller to a target.
BtAvrcpControllerSubUnitInfoRequest  Display Controller subunit informaion.
BtAvrcpControllerSetActiveDeviceRequest  Set Active bt device (shown only on AVRCP connected devices).
BtAvrcpControllerSetInactiveDeviceRequest  Set Inactive bt device (shown only on AVRCP connected and active device).
BtAvrcpPanelFeatureCount  Mandatory last entry.

void BtAvrcpPanelApplication::UpdateContext (   ) 
 

Invoked before displaying the device(sub-unit) list window Also invoked when there is change in selection of items in the list. This is to update the Soft key context.
